Title: Directs that the flag to be flown at half-staff to commemorate the death of members of the United States armed forces who were residents of New York and were killed in action
Summary: Directs that the flag be flown at half-staff to commemorate the death of members of the United States armed forces who were residents of New York and were killed in action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to authorizing the flag to be flown at half-staff to commemorate the death of certain members of the armed forces
